OOC - Part of the discussion that Dinobot was having with Vice Grip was tha=
t they should hold some of their troops back, expecitng an ambush or ssuch =
from the Maximals.  Rather than let them know that Hydras has had significa=
nt reinforcements, keep them in the shadows - since Dinobit is likely to pu=
ll some hearstrings and Vice Grip is otherwise an unknown lieutenant, the g=
eneral thought was to keep them away from the front lines and held in reser=
ve, and keeping most of the Predacon forces away from the front to backstab=
 the Maximals later on or carry out secondary goals.
